item.title: qxbacklight
item.description: A bash script for setting the brightness with xbacklight quickly. Dependencies xbacklight Installation Clone the repository (https://github.com/spcmd/qxbacklight.git) or download from Github. Copy qxbacklight to somewhere in your $PATH (for example: ~/bin) or copy wherever you like, then give the full path to the script when using it. Make it executable (for example: chmod +x /path/to/qxbacklight) Open the script with a text editor and configure the options (see Configurable Options and the detailed comments in the script).
